description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XPATH_FUNC_006` |
| **Name** | XPath translate function injection |
| **Category** | XPATH |
| **Subcategory** | function_abuse |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
